metadata.title: CVE-2023-39234 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple out-of-bounds write vulnerabilities exist in the VZTvzt_rd_process_block autosort functionality of GTKWave 3.3.115. A speciallycrafted .vzt file can lead to arbitrary code execution. A victim would needto open a malicious file to trigger these vulnerabilities.Thisvulnerability concerns the out-of-bounds write when looping over`lt->numrealfacs`.

criterions.comment: gtkwave: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
